thread.title: J.J. Watt dons Batman costume to greet kids at children’s hospital
thread.title_full: J.J. Watt dons Batman costume to greet kids at children’s hospital

title: J.J. Watt dons Batman costume to greet kids at children’s hospital
text:
By Cox Media Group National Content Desk HOUSTON — 
Some NFL fans think Houston Texans star defensive end J.J. Watt has superpower skills on the field. 
Now he’s flexing his superhero muscles for a special group of fans. 
Watt wore a Batman costume for a surprise appearance at Texas Children’s Hospital. He met and posed with patients for photos, played games and helped the kids paint pumpkins during his visit. J.J. Watt dresses up as Batman to surprise children at Texas Children’s Hospital http://t.co/zqXDHrD3VF pic.twitter.com/n3XXhCkeRB — Sports Illustrated (@SInow) October 16, 2015 
Watt’s surprise visit was a big hit and has quickly gone viral on social media. 
JJ Watt is... BATMAN
